message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, but I'm willing to start negotiations at $110. Let me know if this works for you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $95?
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $100 for the product? This would allow us to both feel satisfied with the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $97.50. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more than my initial offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $97.50?
Considering your interest in the product, how about we agree on $98.50 for the product? This would be a fair compromise for both of us.
